introduction.paragraph: I'm also a big extreme sports enthusiast. When I'm not hanging out with my family or at the computer you can find me cruising around on my onewheel or hitting the slopes on my snowboard when it's cold.

problemSolution.header: unleash your full potential with react.
problemSolution.paragraph: this is your place to learn web development. I want this website to be your main source to change the web.

courses.paragraph: I've been teaching people just like you how to build better software for over 8 years. Tens of thousands of people have increased their confidence in shipping software with TestingJavaScript.com and even more have improved the performance and maintainability of their React applications from what they've learned from EpicReact.dev.

blog.paragraph: My blog posts have been read many times on Medium before. Now, they are on my own website! There you'll find blogs about software, programming, hardware, your career, and and more.

blog.blogHeader: Learn about technology, software and development!

discord.header: Make new friends on my discord server.
discord.subheader: Contribute to be better on programming, technology and software.
discord.reasons: There are many reasons to join the server.
discord.firstP: Discord is a chat application. The KCD Community on Discord is a community of people who want to make connections, share ideas, and use software to help make the world a better place.
discord.secondP: We're better when we work together. Discord allows us to have meaningful and nuanced conversations about building software. This community is a fantastic place to get and provide feedback on fun and interesting ideas. We're all motivated to use software to make the world better in a wide variety of ways. Got a project you've been working on? Want to discover facinating ways people are using software? This is the place to be.
discord.allCategories: Here's a quick look at all categories
discord.action: Click on any category to get more info.

tabs.firstDesc: General information about the community, rules, and other stuff.
tabs.secondDesc: Looking for something specific? You may find it on out clubs. From front-end development to back-end, you will find many things.
tabs.thirdDesc: Isn't it obvious? Problems, findings about your favorite programming lanugages are here!
tabs.fourthDesc: Did you find something useful? It changed your life? How about sharing with us!
tabs.fifthDesc: I wish every month new iPhone is released but that is not happening. Let's share other tech you liked.
tabs.sixthDesc: Let's admit, we're not robots, we don't want to be. Connect with people, learn how they solve daily struggles.
tabs.seventhDesc: This is where I shine! If something good is up on the internet, let people know.
tabs.eightDesc: Nobody is perfect, if you got any feedback or suggestion hit us up.

discord.finalCall: Life is better with friends. Find them on discord.
